content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position unknown) and Furnace 1 (position unknown)
- Burner mining drill (position unknown) and Furnace 2 (position unknown)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Chest Setup
- Ensure that chests are correctly positioned and connected to the intended supply chain to receive resources. Adjust setups if materials are not being delivered as expected.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing
